src_original: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati yadā vijñāne na tiṣṭhati tadā vijñāne na yogam āpadyate. cakṣuṣi na tiṣṭhati,
evaṃ śrotre ghrāṇe jihvāyāṃ kāye manasi na tiṣṭhati,
evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. cakṣurvijñāne na tiṣṭhati,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na tiṣṭhati,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite na tiṣṭhati,
